original_text: When they heard this, they tried to take hold of him. But nobody could put their hands on him, because it was not yet the right time.
korean_text: 그들이 예수를 잡고자 하나 손을 대는 자가 없으니 이는 그의 때가 아직 이르지 아니하였음이러라

sentences.original_text: they tried to take hold of him
But nobody could put their hands on him
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 아무도 그에게 손을 댈 수 없었다

sentences.original_text: because it was not yet the right time
